meanings.definition: A rare copper magnesium carbonate mineral with the chemical formula Cu₈Mg(CO₃)₄(OH)₄·7H₂O.
meanings.english_definition: A rare copper magnesium carbonate mineral with the chemical formula Cu₈Mg(CO₃)₄(OH)₄·7H₂O.

examples.sentence: The mineral specimen was identified as swartzite.
examples.translation: その鉱物標本はスワルツァイトと特定された。

etymology.value: Named after Charles K. Swartz (1861–1949), an American geologist at Johns Hopkins University.
